Package client

Class Check

java.lang.Object
client.Check
public class Check extends Object
The Check class is used to check whether a resource's parameter is compliant to the application or not. If not, then it will be returned an error message string
Version:
1.0-SNAPSHOT
Author:
adellafrattina

      public static String geonameID(String geoname_id) throws climatemonitoring.core.ConnectionLostException
      Checks if the geoname id is already taken
      Parameters:
      geoname_id - The geoname id
      Returns:
      An error message as string if the parameter is already taken, null if it is unique
      Throws:
      climatemonitoring.core.ConnectionLostException - When the connection is lost

      Checks if the center id is present or is empty or has contiguous dashes
      Parameters:
      center_id - The center id
      Returns:
      An error message as string if the parameter is not present, null if it exists
      Throws:
      climatemonitoring.core.ConnectionLostException - When the connection is lost

    • address

      public static String[] address(String city, String street, String house_number) throws climatemonitoring.core.ConnectionLostException
      Checks if the address is already taken or is empty or has contiguous dashes
      Parameters:
      city - The geoname id of the center's city
      street - The address' street
      house_number - The address' house number
      Returns:
      An array of strings that is the place-holder for the error messages. The array is guaranteed to be not null with a length of 5. At index 0 is saved the possible error message for city geoname ID. At index 1 is saved the possible error message for house number. At index 2 is saved the possible error message for street. At index 3 is saved the possible error message for the general address. At index 4 is saved the possible error message from the database.
      Throws:
      climatemonitoring.core.ConnectionLostException - When the connection is lost

    • district

      public static String district(String d)
      Checks if the district has contiguous dashes
      Parameters:
      d - The district
      Returns:
      Null if the parameter is valid, an error message as string if not

    • monitors

      public static String monitors(String center_id, String geoname_id) throws climatemonitoring.core.ConnectionLostException
      Checks if the specified center monitors the specified area
      Parameters:
      center_id - The center id
      geoname_id - The area's geoname id
      Returns:
      An error message as string if the center does not monitor the area, null if it does
      Throws:
      climatemonitoring.core.ConnectionLostException - When the connection is lost

      Parameters:

      user_id - The operator's user id
      Returns:
